summary: I remember playing with this mod Years ago, Maybe back in 2014, Somehow it got removed and lost from the world, i managed to find it again and hope to share it out so that it can be reborn
descriptionHtml:
[b][font=Comic Sans MS][color=#ffff00][size=2]The mod is re-skin based off of the mod [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/26329/?]"Automatic Crossbows"[/url] by J3X & Rizing & The original mod page has been gone since 2014

[img]http://i.imgur.com/wWPWe7e.png[/img]

This mod adds a bunch of Modern Day [s]------[/s]> Future looking Firearms, From AK47 to M4A1 and a bunch more.
you will be shooting bandits, dragons, giants, guards & BRAITH for days with this mod

You can find these guns at any smithing station once you have the perk SteelSmithing
SteelSmithing - player.addperk 000CB40D

[u]INSTALL[/u]
[/size][/color][/font][/b][list=1]
[*][font=Comic Sans MS][color=#ffff00][size=2][b]Extract the ModernFirearms.Zip file to your desktop[/b][/size][/color][/font]
[*][font=Comic Sans MS][color=#ffff00][size=2][b]Open C:\Program Files (x86)\Steam\steamapps\common\Skyrim\Data[/b][/size][/color][/font]
[*][font=Comic Sans MS][color=#ffff00][size=2][b]Drag and Drop the files from ModernFirearms into your Skyrim Data folder[/b][/size][/color][/font]
[*][font=Comic Sans MS][color=#ffff00][size=2][b]And then you should be set, After that just enable it in your skyrim launcher and your done[/b][/size][/color][/font]
[/list]
author: AESRYL
